source.author: W. Carl Taylor , Neil T. Luebke , Donald M. Britton , R. James Hickey , Daniel F. Brunton

bio:treatment.discussion: Genus 1, species ca. 150 (24 species in the flora):

references.reference: Jermy, A. C. 1990. Isoëtaceae. In: K. Kubitzki et al., eds. 1990+. The Families and Genera of Vascular Plants. 1+ vol. Berlin etc. Vol. 1, pp. 26--31.

Tryon, R. M. and A. F. Tryon. 1982. Ferns and Allied Plants, with Special Reference to Tropical America. New York, Heidelberg, and Berlin.
